snippet: A prominent Brazilian sailing and environmental organization declined a city contract to help clean up the sewage- and trash-filled Guanabara Bay because of “institutional risks.”
lead_paragraph: A prominent Brazilian sailing and environmental organization declined a city contract to help clean up the sewage- and trash-filled Guanabara Bay because of “institutional risks.”

headline.main: Rio’s Bay Cleanup Is Dealt a Setback
headline.print_headline: Rio’s Bay Cleanup Is Dealt a Setback
